title: RECHERCHE COLOC, CHAMBRE MEUBLÉ, 1ER AVRIL
description: Bonjour à tous, Nous sommes deux très agréables colocs (1 gars et une fille) et présentement à la recherche d'une 3e personne pour partager un magnifique 5 1/2 dans les quartier ahuntsic. Nous recherchons une personne calme, respectueuse, propre et soucieuse du bien être des autres. Doit absolument avoir un emploi et/ou être aux études. Nous vivons au dessus d'un propriétaire très gentil alors nous ne faisons pas de party. Voici des infos sur la location: -La chambre est meublée -Internet haute vitesse compris -Électricité et chauffage inclu - Laveuse, sécheuse, lave vaisselle, poele, frigo - Cinéma maison Notez que j'ai un chat dénommé Velcro qui est très affectueux et prêt à vous recevoir avec des calins! Nb. le proprio n'accepte pas d'animaux supplémentaires. Idéale pour étudiant à l'université Udem, l'Uqam, Collège Ahuntsic, Cégep Marie-Victorin. Tout près du metro Sauvé ou St-Michel et des lignes d'autobus 121 sauvé, 67, 467 express st-michel. L'appart est aussi situé près du magnifique parc nature de l'ile de la visitation. Parfait pour le vélo, ski de fond et autres activités. Épicerie et pharmacie à moins de 5min de marche. Si vous êtes intéressé, laissez moi une brève description de vous même ainsi que vos coordonnées

title: Looking for a roommate asap
description: Private room for rent in a shared apartment from mid-March (lease takeover). The apartment comes fully furnished and is a minute's walk from Atwater metro station, several grocery stores ( PA, Adonis, IGA) and a shopping mall (Alexis Nihon). Also, a 10 minute walk from Concordia University. You would be sharing this apartment with 4 friendly people, mixed gendre. Please PM for further details. I expect to hear from ONLY clean and responsible people. Thank you! Further costs: Wifi (shared) 14$ per month Hydro Bill (10$ during summer and up to $50 during winter per month) Furniture in the bedroom is $250 one time payment (includes the bed which is originally $500, desk, curtains, lamp, mirror). P.S. Guarantor needed, tenant pays $100 to the landlord for the credit check. Read Less

title: Furnished BR in Clean & Quiet 4.5 (top floor) - 7 mins a metro
description: Welcome all/Bienvenue toutes la monde :) If you would like to see more pictures, can copy/paste this link: https://photos.app.goo.gl/KxmxmrccgnEBUwFp7 So up for rent/room-share is 1 fully furnished closed bedroom in a fully equipped, clean, tidy, well kept 4.5 home. Top floor of a 6-plex with a great Land Lord. 2 balconies & bedrooms are on opposing sides. We got lots of sunshine, 3 x ceiling fans, spot lights, huge living room that rarely gets used. Washer and dryer in the kitchen. The bedrooms will be painted 'sunshine yellow' by April 1st. Address is: H4G 2Y1 (google map it) 7 mins walk to 2 metro stations (Verdun or De l'eglise) with buses 58 & 61 frequently running on Wellington. I often catch it when I leave home or on my way back, makes doing groceries and winter travels so much easier. All stores, banks, groceries, fruiteries, pharmacies etc close by within walking distance. Downtown travel via STM (to metro Guy) takes me 15-20 mins. Close to downtown without the downtown noise and pollution. Multiple Bixi bike stations plus access to bike path & Lachine Canal. St. Laurent River is very close too, like a 5 mins walk and so amazing in the summer. Price is $425 monthly for rent and unlimited high speed wifi internet. Hydro (separate) will range from $40-80 per month per person. Perfect for studious students or young professionals that want a clean, quiet, safe space to live for a few months. Everything is in my name so I make sure that we're both good here. I expect a clean, peaceful roommate who will keep their social life outside of this home e.i no house parties, drugs, sleepovers, regular guests, and will take initiative to do their part ei help keep the home clean. We can do it together or individually, either is fine, but it is an absolute must or a deal breaker, esp the bathroom and kitchen. I won't tolerate frequent laziness or inconsideration. I'm very chill and free spirited, but I'm also tough on cleanliness/laziness - as independant adults, it should be natural by now. More info will be added soon feel free to contact. Thanks and happy hunting
